mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_parameter(id, en_name, cn_name, param_value, default_value, is_inner, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, description) values ( #{id}, #{enName}, #{cnName}, #{paramValue}, #{defaultValue}, #{isInner}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, #{description} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_parameter set en_name = #{enName}, cn_name = #{cnName}, param_value = #{paramValue}, default_value = #{defaultValue}, is_inner = #{isInner}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, description = #{description}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
